column2: While on a border patrol, a courtier won a great victory against when cornered by a dozen enemies. He slew half of them, and the rest fled. The court is hailing him as a great warrior!
column3: @FIXME@ While on a border patrol, a courtier won a great victory against when cornered by a dozen enemies. He slew half of them, and the rest fled. The court is hailing him as a great warrior!

column2: I could have done just as well.
column3: @FIXME@ I could have done just as well.

column2: While on a border patrol, a courtier was ambushed, but fled and left his men to die! His name is in disgrace.
column3: @FIXME@ While on a border patrol, a courtier was ambushed, but fled and left his men to die! His name is in disgrace.

column2: Wights have been spotted on some nights at some isolated hills. Your people beg you to drive them out, but what can men do against such dark magic?
column3: @FIXME@ Wights have been spotted on some nights at some isolated hills. Your people beg you to drive them out, but what can men do against such dark magic?

column2: Send a small force to end the threat.
column3: @FIXME@ Send a small force to end the threat.

column2: A man was caught felling trees and clearing land for a farm inside your realm's borders. What shall be done with him and his family?
column3: @FIXME@ A man was caught felling trees and clearing land for a farm inside your realm's borders. What shall be done with him and his family?

column2: Let them go - but warn them not to return.
column3: @FIXME@ Let them go - but warn them not to return.

column2: Let the family go, but imprison the father.
column3: @FIXME@ Let the family go, but imprison the father.

column2: This courtier has composed a stunning new epic, which brings tears to the eyes of anyone who hears it. It will be played at the annual Feast of Starlight this year.
column3: @FIXME@ This courtier has composed a stunning new epic, which brings tears to the eyes of anyone who hears it. It will be played at the annual Feast of Starlight this year.

column2: It reminds me of the first light of a winter moon!
column3: @FIXME@ It reminds me of the first light of a winter moon!
